title: First Bloom
body:
Charly,

Every tiny win you make feels big to me.
Even your quiet moments are bright.

- Joe

title: Soft Evenings
body:
My love,

You make ordinary evenings feel warm.
I still smile at your sleepy face on movie nights.

- Joe

title: Your Spark
body:
Charly,

You bring energy to every room.
That big smile of yours always wins me over.

- Joe

title: Playful Promise
body:
Hey trouble,

If you steal the blanket again,
I still choose you.
Every single night.

- Joe

title: Little Things
body:
Charly,

I notice the little things:
Your laugh, your focus, your kindness.
They matter more than you think.

- Joe

title: Always Home
body:
My heart,

No matter where we go,
home is wherever we are together.

- Joe

title: Forever Note
body:
Charly,

Thank you for being my favorite person.
I will keep choosing you,
softly and loudly,
every day.

- Joe
